Name: Red Dog Smash
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of mint sprig &orange zest twist.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Created in 2007 by Cam Dawson , Brighton, England, for the Jack Daniel's Birthday Competition.
History: Jack Daniel was the owner of two saloons in Lynchburg town square, the most famous being the White Rabbit Saloon due to the limited edition bottling of the same name. This cocktail celebrates the lesser known Red Dog Saloon.
